languages.text: "Мы бы нашли выход, если бы объединили усилия с собратом по вере, а не отвратительным чудовищем! Но теперь Комиссар мертв, а мы — сами по себе".

traits.locale_text: "Мы бы нашли выход, если бы объединили усилия с собратом по вере, а не отвратительным чудовищем! Но теперь Комиссар мертв, а мы — сами по себе".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."
languages.original_text: "Мы бы нашли выход, если бы объединили усилия с собратом по вере, а не отвратительным чудовищем! Но теперь Комиссар мертв, а мы — сами по себе".

traits.locale_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果我们的盟友是信仰帝皇的同志，而不是令人厌恶的怪物，我们本可以找到出路！可现在，政委已经死了，我们只能靠我们自己了。”
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们的盟友是信仰帝皇的同志，而不是令人厌恶的怪物，我们本可以找到出路！可现在，政委已经死了，我们只能靠我们自己了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ya habríamos encontrado una salida si hubiéramos unido nuestras fuerzas a las de un hermano en la fe y no un monstruo repugnante! Pero ahora el Comisario ha muerto y debemos apañárnoslas por nuestra cuenta».
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya habríamos encontrado una salida si hubiéramos unido nuestras fuerzas a las de un hermano en la fe y no un monstruo repugnante! Pero ahora el Comisario ha muerto y debemos apañárnoslas por nuestra cuenta».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「怪物ではなく、信念を貫く同志と手を組めば、道は開けるだろう！しかし、今コミッサーは死んでしまった。我々が自力でなんとかせねばならない」
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: 「怪物ではなく、信念を貫く同志と手を組めば、道は開けるだろう！しかし、今コミッサーは死んでしまった。我々が自力でなんとかせねばならない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir würden einen Weg hinaus finden, wenn wir uns mit einem Glaubensgenossen zusammentun, nicht mit einem abstoßenden Monstrum! Doch nun ist der Kommissar tot und wir sind auf uns allein gestellt."
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: "Wir würden einen Weg hinaus finden, wenn wir uns mit einem Glaubensgenossen zusammentun, nicht mit einem abstoßenden Monstrum! Doch nun ist der Kommissar tot und wir sind auf uns allein gestellt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous aurions trouvé une issue si nous avions saisi la main d'un fidèle coreligionnaire, et non d'un monstre répugnant ! Mais aujourd'hui, le commissaire n'est plus, et nous voilà livrés à nous-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: « Nous aurions trouvé une issue si nous avions saisi la main d'un fidèle coreligionnaire, et non d'un monstre répugnant ! Mais aujourd'hui, le commissaire n'est plus, et nous voilà livrés à nous-mêmes. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

languages.text: "Yanımızda iğrenç bir yaratık değil de bir din kardeşimiz olsaydı çoktan bulmuştuk! Lakin Komiser ölüp gitti, biz de bir başımıza kaldık."
languages.original_text: "We would find a way out if we joined forces with a comrade in faith, and not a repulsive monster! But now the Commissar is dead, and we are on our own."

traits.locale_text: "Yanımızda iğrenç bir yaratık değil de bir din kardeşimiz olsaydı çoktan bulmuştuk! Lakin Komiser ölüp gitti, biz de bir başımıza kaldık."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
